app_name: Groups Control Groups Photo and Video Editing Apps Carbon12 B W Film Emulation
app_description: Give your movies and photos a timeless black and white look with Monotone our new app that s designed to make your images and videos stand out! With over 300 B W filters to choose from including duotones and vintage presets you can easily transform any image or video into a stunning black and white masterpiece. And with our advanced adjustment options including curves vignettes and overlays you can fine tune your results to perfection. Monotone is packed with features to help you get the most out of your black and white creations including HSL sliders for B W conversion and Photoshop s Calculations. You can also download presets with ease by scanning the QR codes provided. But that s not all our app also adds film grain for both images and videos giving your creations an authentic film like feel. Plus our advanced vignetting options including Classic and Natural let you add a unique touch to your images and videos. Monotone comes with a variety of included analog film emulations such as Agfa APX 25 Ilford Delta 400 and Kodak TRI X 400 to name a few. With so many options to choose from you re sure to find the perfect look for your black and white creations. Download Monotone today and start creating timeless unforgettable images and videos! Included Analog Film Emulations: Agfa APX 25 Agfa APX 100 Agfa APX 400 Agfa Scala 200 Fomapan 100 Fomapan 200 Fuji FP 3000b Fuji Neopan 100 Across Fuji Neopan 400 Fuji Neopan 1600 Ilford Delta 100 Ilford Delta 400 Ilford Delta 800 Ilford Delta 3200 Ilford FP4 Plus 125 Ilford HP5 Plus Ilford Ortho 80 Ilford Pan F Ilford SFX 200 Ilford XP2 Kodak T MAX 100 Kodak T MAX 400 Kodak T MAX P3200 Kodak TRI X 200 Kodak TRI X 400 Konica 750 Film Polaroid 664 Polaroid 667 Polaroid 672 Rollei 25 Rollei IR 400
